zowe.commands.alwaysEdit.description: Allow editing of commands before submitting

scripts.build: gulp build && yarn license && webpack --mode development
scripts.build:integration: yarn createTestProfileData && yarn license && tsc --pretty --project tsconfig-tests.json
scripts.vscode:prepublish: gulp build && webpack --mode production && yarn updateStrings && yarn run compile-web
scripts.lint: yarn lint:src && yarn lint:tests && yarn lint:pretty && yarn markdown
